name: ONE LAST NIGHT
description:
WELCOME FERRYMAN
 
CAR-ON.TE IS NOW UP AND RUNNING ON YOUR PHONE.
 
YOU ARE NOW A FERRYMAN FOR THIS TOWN, IT'S YOUR JOB TO HELP PEOPLE GET BACK TO THEIR DESTINATION.
THEY BELIEVE IN YOU.
I BELIEVE IN YOU.
 
LISTEN TO THEM, LEARN WHERE THEY NEED TO BE AND ESCORT THEM THROUGH ONE LAST NIGHT.
 
 
One Last Night is a game based around listening carefully and exploring. 
 
Learn from your clients and discover what's happening in this game that hides quite a lot more than you expect.
 
 
CONTROLS---
 
WASD TO MOVE
R TO TURN THE RADIO ON AND OFF
T TO CHANGE RADIO STATION
E TO OPEN AND CLOSE CAR'S WINDOW
N TO PULL UP OR HIDE YOUR PHONE
USE THE MOUSE TO LOOK AROUND
